title: Network issues
body: Sometimes after the champion select I can't get to the loading screen. I get the message "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect" and it keeps doing it until the end of the game if I press reconnect.  Everything else internet-related works fine. It happens randomly and there is no issues with the next game.

replies.body: This can happen if a block or instability is causing your network to fail connecting to the game server.  You'll want to stick to a custom game for testing, and run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide for the fix.
